channel.title: I cant connect to my server!
channel.description: I have been trying to connect to my server for over a month, i know i have everything ready but it just doesn't work. i have port forwarded and everything and it still doesn't work, i am currently using vista, if anyone can help me connect to my server and let other people join, it would be very helpful. If you want to talk on aim its muhammad445@aol.com. Thanks!

item.title: I cant connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @t_a_i_n_t t a i n t
item.description:
@t_a_i_n_t wrote:

if you dont have a router, you can use utorrent. Download it and open preferences, the connection. On the port for incoming connections type in the port u want to use, like say it was 43594 u wanted to use. type 43594 in there. This is also listed in the “5 min” tut.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant connect to my server!

i have to use the defauld ip like 127.0.0.1 i belive thats wat your problem is, but i’m not sure
i hope i was able to help…

item.title: I cant connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

if yo realy did evrything on the tut and still cant connect then this cud be the problem

you gotta update the no-ip because with some routers your ip changes and the nyou need to update the no-ip host
like mine or there is an error in the source run.bat and make sure your source online before you login with a client…

if you are using a source and knowing what it is… then your source might be “broken” and get a new one
